product_name: New Balance MT810v2 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The New Balance MT810v2 trail-running shoes are all-terrain runners built for performance and comfort. Nylon mesh uppers are highly breathable, and feature synthetic textile overlays for lightweight support. Polyester/nylon blend linings wick moisture for all-day comfort. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Blown rubber outsoles are flexible and lightweight, and feature lugs that deliver traction on the trail and the road. The New Balance MT810v2 trail-running shoes feature an 8mm heel-to-toe drop.
short_description: The New Balance MT810v2 trail-running shoes are all-terrain runners built for performance and comfort.
